text: Melekasovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Alegazovsky Selsoviet, Mechetlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 259 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km from Bolsheustyikinskoye, 9 km from Alegazovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Mechetlinsky District
title: Melekasovo
